item.description:
The Currier Museum of Art 150 Ash St, Manchester, NH.,First Thursdays LIVE
Thursday, Feb. 7th., 5:30-7:30 pm.                                                                   
$10 for non-members No reservations required.
Thursday, February 7, 5:30-7:30 pm - Odaiko New England

Host: Steve Ob1.   603-491-1962   ob@tds.net
First Thursdays feature live music, an opportunity to view the museum’s collection of European and American art and special exhibitions, gallery talks, a chance to mingle with other art and music lovers, and complimentary snacks. A cash bar and full menu is available at the cafe. Come see what we have to offer!
First Thursday LIVE programs are FREE for members,

Celebrate an evening of Japanese culture with a powerful taiko drum performance by Odaiko New England. Audience participation is encouraged! Visit the special exhibition Lethal Beauty: Samurai Weapons and Armor, and try your hand at Samurai-themed origami. Be sure to view the Art Center faculty exhibition in the Community Gallery.

Steve Ob1. wrote:   I will have a Meetup name tack and carrying a Meetup sign.
item.name: FIRST THURSDAY @ THE CURRIER MUSEUM
